devdoc.author: Anish Agnihotri
devdoc.details: Completed loans are represented as tokenOwner = 0x0 to prevent      errors w.r.t stack too deep (too large of a struct to include a bool)Unlike original spec., lenders are paid for only active duration (D')

params._future: allows calculating accrued interest in future

returns._0: Accrued interest on current top bid, in Ether

params._future: allows calculating require payment in future
allows calculating required additional capital in future

returns._0: required interest payment to cover current top bidder

cancelLoan(uint256).details: requires no active bids to be placed (else, use repay)

params._interestRate: percentage fixed interest rate for period

params._loanId: id of loan to draw from
id of loan to seize collateral

underwriteLoan(uint256).details: Requires an unpaid loan, where currentBid < newBid <= maxBid

devdoc.title: PawnBank: NFT-collateralized lending

calculateInterestAccrued(uint256,uint256.notice: Helper: Calculate accrued interest for a particular lender

calculateRequiredRepayment(uint256,uint2.notice: Helper: Calculate required capital to repay loan

calculateTotalInterest(uint256,uint256).notice: Helper: Calculates required additional capital (over topbid) to outbid loan

createLoan(address,uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Enables an NFT owner to create a loan, specifying parameters

drawLoan(uint256).notice: Enables NFT owner to draw capital from top bid

repayLoan(uint256).notice: Enables anyone to repay a loan on behalf of owner

seizeNFT(uint256).notice: Enables anyone to seize NFT, for lender, on loan default

underwriteLoan(uint256).notice: Enables a lender/bidder to underwrite a loan, given it is the top bid
